original_text: Four thousand are to be gatekeepers and four thousand are to praise the Lord with the musical instruments I have provided for that purpose.”
korean_text: 사천 명은 문지기요 사천 명은 그가 여호와께 찬송을 드리기 위하여 만든 악기로 찬송하는 자들이라

sentences.original_text: Four thousand are to be gatekeepers
and four thousand are to praise the Lord
I have provided for that purpose
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 목적을 위해 마련한 것들로
